abstract: Visa reports first-quarter profit of $1.57 billion, or $2.53 a share, up 11 percent from profit of $1.41 billion in year-ago quarter; revenue was $3.38 billion compared with $3.16 billion in year-ago quarter; will split its stock four-for-one.
lead_paragraph: The company said it processed $1.2 trillion in payments on its network in the latest quarter, up 11 percent compared with a year ago.
snippet: The company said it processed $1.2 trillion in payments on its network in the latest quarter, up 11 percent compared with a year ago.

headline.main: Visa Posts Higher Profits and Will Split Its Stock
headline.print_headline: Visa Posts Higher Profits and Will Split Its Stock
